title: Flight Simulator 2020 - How to - ATR 42 600/72 600 - using LNAV
description:
This video will guide you through using the autopilot in the ATR 42-600/72-600, with a particular focus on the LNAV mode and its role in adhering to your flight plan. Additionally, we will explore the RNAV mode, which requires LNAV to be active and assists in maintaining a specified speed or climb rate.

0:00 intro
0:10 setting up the prerequisites
4:55 switching on the autopilot
6:30 activating the LNAV mode
7:14 activating the VNAV mode
8:52 monitoring progress
